cast.overview: Two con artists try to swindle a stamp collector by selling him a sheet of counterfeit rare stamps, the "nine queens".
cast.title: Nine Queens

details.biography:
Alejandro Awada is an Argentine actor recognized for his work across film, theatre, and television. He's had notable roles in Historia de un clan (2015), The Aura (2005), Gone Fishing (2012), El marginal (2016), The Secretary (2020) and Yosi, the Regretful Spy (2022).

He's the son of Abraham Awada, a Lebanese immigrant businessman, founder of the Awada clothing brand. He has four siblings, one of which is former First Lady Juliana Awada.
details.name: Alejandro Awada
